channel.title: Character configuring .bin file!
channel.description: Hello everybody i need help. So all my character files are BIN files how do i open them ? i really whana know it cuz need to make myself owner. help please.

item.title: Character configuring .bin file!
item.dc:creator: @David321 David321
item.description:
@David321 wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:2, topic:424914”][quote author=David321 link=topic=527575.msg3845877#msg3845877 date=1323624044]
Hello everybody i need help. So all my character files are BIN files how do i open them ? i really whana know it cuz need to make myself owner. help please.
[/quote]
You don’t make yourself owner there, you have to add it in PlayerAction.java
(if I recall correct, it should be at the top… But I haven’t coded in while… so I am not 100% sure)[/quote]

And how it means? like how will add that im server owner?

Read full topic

item.title: Character configuring .bin file!
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

David321:

Hello everybody i need help. So all my character files are BIN files how do i open them ? i really whana know it cuz need to make myself owner. help please.

You don’t make yourself owner there, you have to add it in PlayerAction.java
(if I recall correct, it should be at the top… But I haven’t coded in while… so I am not 100% sure)

Read full topic
